line_2: THUS says the prophet of the Turk,

line_1: A Pestilential Sow, a meazel'd Pork
line_2: On the Foundation has been long at work,

line_1: To make Wesphalia Hams of English Pork.
line_2: Troth Sir, you have less Conscience than a Turk,

line_1: To make Wesphalia Hams of English Pork.
line_2: To put an honest Muse on Conjuring Work,

line_1: Was very dry, her dinner pork;
line_2: Now Baucis, who came hot from work,
